text: winter is a little hard for me you guys
I probably have told you this before so
when winter rolls around I try to keep

healthy foods and things that are

to eat that way so I've been eating a
lot of citrus lately because it's
finally in season and it's so good
today's recipe is seared salmon with a
citrus and fennel salad and it's really
bright and fresh and it's something nice
and healthy and you know really good to

are navel oranges remove the peel and

want to cut between the membrane to
allow the segment's to drop into a bowl
I already have one done so it's a total
of two do this directly over the bowl

it
I'm just getting my salad already before

these look ready to turn I have a fish
